name: Potion
description: Heal one of your Pokemon by 2 HP.

name: X Speed
description: One Pokemon of choice can move 1 extra space.

name: Full Restore
description: Remove all negative Status conditions from one of your Pokemon.

name: Firebreather
description: The next Fire attack deals +2 damage.

name: Burglar
description: Ally Fire and Poison types are protected.

name: Swimmer
description: One ally Swim Pokemon gains 1 Move.

name: Sailor
description: One ally Water Pokemon gains 1 Power until the end of your turn.

name: Aroma Lady
description: Removes status conditions from all allies. Put up to 2 Grass-type Status cards from the discard pile into your hand.

name: Lass
description: All ally Grass, Fairy, and Normal types of Rank 3 and lower gain 2 Shield.

name: Engineer
description: Put up to 2 Electric-type cards from the discard pile into your hand.

name: Cyclist
description: Ally Electric and Flying types can move 1 extra space.

name: Camper
description: Allies of Rank 4 and lower with the Walk trait gain 1 Power.

name: Picnicker
description: Allies of Rank 4 and lower with the Walk trait gain 1 Move.

name: Tamer
description: Allies of Rank 5 and above gain 1 Power and take 3 damage.
